reviewText:
This is one of Ricardo Darin's best films.  It is a very charming love story that is really entertaining. It is hard to describe this movie, without giving the ending away.

The movie is filmed in Argentina, with beautiful scenery.  The movie containes english subtitles, as well as other extras that make this worthwhile.

I recommend this movie for everyone who likes Argentina movies and Ricardo Darin.  He is one of the best and sexiest actors I know.
